tool_description: Plaintext query api to retreive data from blockchain.info
name: Blockchain Info
title: Blockchain Info

api_list.name: Total BTC Input
api_list.description: Get total input value of a transaction (in satoshi)

api_list.name: Total BTC Output
api_list.description: Get total output value of a transaction

api_list.name: Transaction Results
Transaction Fee
api_list.description: Get total input value of a transaction

api_list.name: Address First Seen
api_list.description: Timestamp of the block an address was first confirmed in

api_list.name: Received by Address
api_list.description: Get the total number of bitcoins received by an address (in satoshi).

api_list.name: Get Sent by Address
api_list.description: Get the total number of bitcoins sent by an address

api_list.name: Address Balance
api_list.description: Get the balance of an address (in satoshis)
